Headline: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Oakton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity near Oakton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are standing near UIC-Halsted due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line  trains are standing near UIC-Halsted due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
